title: HTTPS - Phase II
user_story:
As an API user\
I want my communication to ALWAYS be encrypted\
So I can be sure that the responses really come from More Cars and are not manipulated\
(Even when I accidentally use HTTP in my requests instead of HTTPS)
description:
* every route is accessible via HTTPS, e.g. `https://api.more-cars.net/brands`
* each GET request via HTTP is automatically redirected to HTTPS
  * e.g. `GET http://api.more-cars.net/brands` → `GET https://api.more-cars.net/brands`
  * status code `301`
* POST, DELETE and UPDATE requests are **not** redirected
  * such requests are rejected and will not be processed
  * status code `426` (Upgrade Required)
* every “public“ environment needs to have a valid certificate (no self-signed)
* for local environments it is not possible to have valid certificates
  * all tools and test frameworks need to be able to handle valid and invalid certificates
* this ticket invalidates the acceptance criteria <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCA-1528> and <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCA-1529> from story <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCA-1525>
